name: Clutter Puzzle Magazine Vol. 15 No. 1 Collector's Edition
name_original: Clutter Puzzle Magazine Vol. 15 No. 1 Collector's Edition
description:
The most fun & challenging Clutter yet, with over 1700 puzzles to keep you playing for days and days. So many new Clutter variations mixed in with old favorites for a Quest you'll never forget. The biggest treat though, is the never before seen, fully replayable, Spot The Differences Puzzles. Just like regular Clutter levels, they are highly addicting too.

In addition, there are Sliders, Square Jigsaws & Box Quotes.
And the Return of Super-Thin Sliders with Auto-Save!!!
And wait until you see the Number Tile Puzzles.

You've never seen Clutter this fun & challenging.
And as always, the options let you play Clutter the way you want.
And Favorites allow you can collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

  • New Object Sets & Many New Gameplay Modes
  • Over 1700 levels and a very challenging 100 level Main Quest
  • An extra easy No-Motion Old-School Quest
  • The brand new and addicting Spot The Difference Puzzlle
  • Hundreds of picture puzzles and 200 new Box Quotes puzzles
  • Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
  • Another Great Soundtrack with a Cinematic Feel.

Sequel to Clutter RefleXIVe: The Diceman Cometh - Collector's Edition, winner of Best Hidden Object Game, 2023 (Big Fish Games) and Top 3 of 2023 (iWin).
